endpoints.description: Retrieve an overview of all available materials and their attributes.
Initiate a procurement request for a specific material or set of materials.
Obtain a detailed report of current inventory levels across facilities.
Update or optimize the routing information for a material shipment.
Remove specified material items from inventory following standard protocols.
Submit parameters to receive predictions on material demand based on historical data.
Configure notification preferences for updates on procurement, inventory, and logistics.
Track the real-time location and status of a specified shipment.
Create and download a report summarizing procurement and logistics activities.
Retrieve a list of suppliers along with their performance and reliability ratings.
